title: '"Ethereal Opulence: A Majestic Trilogy of Mysore Sandal
body: and Rose Soap"''5.0 out of 5 stars''Enveloping oneself in the grandeur of Mysore Sandal Jasmine and Rose Soap has been nothing short of a transcendent encounter. This triumvirate of exquisite fragrances has orchestrated a symphony of luxury that redefines the art of bathing. With every embrace of this soap the noble essence of sandalwood the ethereal allure of jasmine and the timeless elegance of rose unite in perfect harmony orchestrating an olfactory masterpiece that bestows a regal aura even hours after the cleansing ritual. Presented as a trio this majestic offering of opulence not only cleanses but elevates transforming mere daily hygiene into an extravagant rendezvous with opulent splendor.'

title: 'Best gifting option'
body: The soaps smell divine. I just held it in my hand. Even my hand is smelling so good. This soap is iconic. Even if you keep it in the bathroom, you don't need air freshener. And the packaging is so so beautiful. Perfect for gifting.

title: 'Defective product'
body: The worst product received. And they don't have a return policy. I waited for more than 2 weeks for three soap. The worst thing is finally I got an old stock and is powdery. I don't have return for it. I am so unhappy for the product. I would like to get it returned.

title: 'The best soap in the Indian market.'
body: I've been using this soap for many years now, and I couldn't be happier. What I particularly love about it is the strong smell which your body gives out after you've had a bath with this soap. You actually feel clean, and you give that impression to others too. Also, since it is very dry, it's particularly good for oily skin like mine.

title: 'there is no fragrance and nor even any smell. feel cheated.'
body: 'There is no fragrance at all. Cheated for the name of Mysore Sandal. There is no smell at all. Feel like I have been cheated. I will not buy this product at all. You too have some criterion of evaluation for the products on sale. VERY BAD. VERY BAD.'

body: 'This was my first purchase of mysore soaps and I think these are pretty good. They give heveanly scent and do not give any side effects to the skin and eyes. You should try this product.'
